scripts.note0: I dunno why, but tap-spec causes the tests to fail
scripts.note1: we can't have nice things. prepublish also runs on npm install https://github.com/npm/npm/issues/6394 in-publish hacks around this
scripts.prepublish: in-publish && source ./scripts.sh && npm prune && npm run gitPush || in-install
scripts.dmn: dmn gen -f . && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add .npmignore && git commit --no-verify -m'update npmignore'; fi
scripts.doctoc: doctoc README.md --maxlevel 3 && if [ -f CONTRIBUTING.md ]; then doctoc CONTRIBUTING.md --maxlevel 3; fi && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add README.md; if [ -f CONTRIBUTING.md ]; then git add CONTRIBUTING.md; fi; git commit --no-verify -m'table of contents update'; fi
scripts.release: source ./scripts.sh && npm run requireGitClean && npm run gitPull && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc && npm_release $@

config.notes: important to correct the path of npm so that the git hook doesn't error

ghooks.pre-push: PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc && npm test

name: generator-iojs
description: A basic node module template, that includes handy git hooks, a release script, and auto-changelog generation.
